---
title: "dplyr and ggplot2 challenge"
---

### Break into groups of 2 and complete the challenge

* Install the babynames package, and load it
* Recreate the graph below for your own name

```{r message=F, warning=F, echo=F}
library(babynames)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
babynames %>% 
  filter(sex=="M", name=="Andrew") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=prop)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title="Popularity of the name Andrew through time")
```
